20110126163432.000|20110126163434.000|CC1|FOOD WASTE IN AMERICA TOTALS    
20110126163434.000|20110126163437.000|CC1|$155 BILLION A YEAR.            
20110126163437.000|20110126163439.000|CC1|THAT'S 500 POUNDS OF FOOD PER   
20110126163439.000|20110126163443.000|CC1|FAMILY THROWN OUT IN THE TRASH. 
20110126163443.000|20110126163444.000|CC1|AMERICANS THROW OUT 2 BILLION   
20110126163444.000|20110126163445.000|CC1|GALLONS OF MILK EVERY YEAR.     
20110126163445.000|20110126163447.000|CC1|THE BEST PLACE TO STORE IT IS

20110126163453.000|20110126163454.000|CC1|TO SEVEN DAYS PAST THE SELL-BY  
20110126163454.000|20110126163457.000|CC1|DATE.

20110126163500.000|20110126163504.000|CC1|COLDEST PART OF YOUR FRIDGE.

20110126163510.000|20110126163512.000|CC1|DID YOU KNOW THAT YOU SHOULD    
20110126163512.000|20110126163514.000|CC1|NEVER MIX YOUR FRUITS AND       
20110126163514.000|20110126163517.000|CC1|VEGGIES IN THE SAME AREA IN YOUR

20110126163518.000|20110126163519.000|CC1|MY MOTHER TOLD ME THAT YEARS AND
20110126163519.000|20110126163520.000|CC1|YEARS AGO.                      
20110126163520.000|20110126163522.000|CC1|>> Reporter: APPLES AND BROCCOLI
20110126163522.000|20110126163522.000|CC1|DON'T MIX.                      
20110126163522.000|20110126163524.000|CC1|MAY SOUND WEIRD BUT IT'S TRUE.  
20110126163524.000|20110126163525.000|CC1|SOME FRUITS LIKE APPLES ACTUALLY
20110126163525.000|20110126163527.000|CC1|GIVE OFF A GAS THAT CAN MAKE    
20110126163527.000|20110126163530.000|CC1|VEGETABLES LIKE BROCCOLI GO BAD.
20110126163530.000|20110126163531.000|CC1|FROM THE FOOD YOU NEAT, TO THE  
20110126163531.000|20110126163534.000|CC1|CAR YOU DRIVE.                  
20110126163534.000|20110126163536.000|CC1|AMERICANS THROW AWAY 280 MILLION
20110126163536.000|20110126163538.000|CC1|TIRES EVERY YEAR.

20110126163604.000|20110126163606.000|CC1|NOT THE ANSWER.

20110126164010.000|20110126164013.000|CC1|>> IT'S A DEVICE THAT BASICALLY 
20110126164013.000|20110126164015.000|CC1|MIMICS THE L.E.D. LIGHT YOU FIND

20110126164035.000|20110126164036.000|CC1|IT'S A HUGE TREND.              
20110126164036.000|20110126164037.000|CC1|>> I'M INTRIGUED BY THAT ONE.   
20110126164037.000|20110126164039.000|CC1|UP NEXT THE EYES ARE ALWAYS A   
20110126164039.000|20110126164040.000|CC1|REALLY ROUGH SPOT FOR ALL OF US.
20110126164040.000|20110126164044.000|CC1|>> EYES ARE PRETTY IMPORTANT.   
20110126164044.000|20110126164045.000|CC1|>> THIS IS PROBABLY MORE SUITED 
20110126164045.000|20110126164045.000|CC1|FOR IT.

20110126164049.000|20110126164050.000|CC1|THAT'S USUALLY WHERE WE PANIC   
20110126164050.000|20110126164051.000|CC1|FIRST.                          
20110126164051.000|20110126164054.000|CC1|RETINOL IS THE GOLD STANDARD FOR
20110126164054.000|20110126164054.000|CC1|ANTI-AGING.                     
20110126164054.000|20110126164056.000|CC1|ROC MAKES A REALLY FABULOUS     
20110126164056.000|20110126164058.000|CC1|RETINOL PRODUCTS BUT RETINOLS   
20110126164058.000|20110126164100.000|CC1|CAN ALSO BE VERY IRRITATING FOR 
20110126164100.000|20110126164102.000|CC1|PEOPLE WITH SENSITIVE SKIN.     
20110126164102.000|20110126164104.000|CC1|THIS NEW RHETT ROLL CORRECTION  
20110126164104.000|20110126164105.000|CC1|SENSITIVE EYE CREAM BECAUSE NOT 
20110126164105.000|20110126164107.000|CC1|ONLY IS IT GOOD FOR SENSITIVE   
20110126164107.000|20110126164108.000|CC1|SKIN IT'S GOOD TO BE USED IN THE
20110126164108.000|20110126164109.000|CC1|DELICATE EYE AREA.              
20110126164109.000|20110126164112.000|CC1|>> I LIKE THAT IDEA.            
20110126164112.000|20110126164114.000|CC1|IT'S NICE THAT THESE ARE ALL    
20110126164114.000|20110126164115.000|CC1|ACCESSIBLE.                     
20110126164115.000|20110126164115.000|CC1|>> COMPLETELY.                  
20110126164115.000|20110126164117.000|CC1|>> I SEE THE WINE, I SEE THE    
20110126164117.000|20110126164119.000|CC1|JUICE, I KNOW THERE'S MORE TO IT
20110126164119.000|20110126164120.000|CC1|THAN HAVING A GLASS OF WINE.    
20110126164120.000|20110126164121.000|CC1|THIS IS FOR YOUR LIPS.          
20110126164121.000|20110126164123.000|CC1|IT'S ONE OF THOSE THINGS WE FIND
20110126164123.000|20110126164125.000|CC1|IN GRAPE SKINS, RIGHT?
